title: Rail Signal
description: An entity which divvies up a rail network into blocks that trains can path through.

circuit_close_signal.title: Circuit Close Signal
circuit_close_signal.description: Whether or not a circuit condition should determine whether this rail signal is open or closed.

circuit_read_signal.title: Circuit Read Signal
circuit_read_signal.description: Whether or not the signal's current state should be broadcast to a connected circuit network as a unit signal. Exactly what signals are output is controlled by `red_output_signal`, `orange_output_signal`, and `green_output_signal`.

red_output_signal.title: Red Output Signal
red_output_signal.description: The signal to broadcast when this signal's state is red.

orange_output_signal.title: Yellow Output Signal
orange_output_signal.description: The signal to broadcast when this signal's state is yellow.

green_output_signal.title: Green Output Signal
green_output_signal.description: The signal to broadcast when this signal's state is green.
